scripts.test: lerna bootstrap && lerna run prepack && yarn jest --silent --runInBand --forceExit --verbose false --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit --ci
scripts.pub:retry: lerna publish from-git --preid beta --pre-dist-tag beta --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:github: lerna publish from-package --preid beta --pre-dist-tag beta --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/node_modules packages/*/lib packages/*/.rpt2_cache packages/*/coverage packages/*/*.log tmp
